statements: DELETE FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE counterparty_name = 'ABC Corp' AND regulatory_compliance = TRUE;
DELETE FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE trade_id = 100 AND regulatory_compliance = TRUE;
DELETE FROM trade_settlement_data WHERE counterparty_name = 'Company ABC' AND transaction_type = 'Buy' AND trade_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND compliance_details LIKE '%missing information%';
DELETE FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_type = 'Buy';
DELETE FROM trade_settlements WHERE settlement_id = 100 AND regulatory_compliance = 'FCA Compliance';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE trade_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'Payment'
